item.title: CVE-2024-27192|2024-03-15T12:44:30.559Z -- Scott Reilly -- Configure SMTP
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Scott Reilly Configure SMTP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Configure SMTP: from n/a through 3.1.
